description: UGEE sells many digital drawing tablets, which users can connect to their computers and use with digital pens to draw in drawing programs. UGEE tablets all use accompanying drivers and software provided by UGEE.

In UGEE Tablet software, users can configure a variety of settings, including mapping keyboard shortcuts to pen buttons, setting pen pressure sensitivity levels, and specifying their screen resolution. Users can export these settings from UGEE Tablet software by selecting Export config from the Settings menu. Doing so saves the settings as a PCFG file.
NOTE: To use UGEE Tablet software, you must have a UGEE tablet connected to your computer.
